description: The free scheme allows islanders to mark sports equipment like kayaks for return if recovered.
title: Guernsey Coastguard marine equipment registration launches
title_page: Guernsey Coastguard marine equipment registration launches - BBC News
maintext: It is not necessary to write a phone number or other personal details on the sticker, as the information will be held at the Joint Emergency Services Control Centre, Guernsey Coastguard confirmed.
